N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.41 - Card games

State Regulations

The requirements for games depicting cards being drawn
from a deck are the following: (a) At
the start of each game or hand, the cards shall be drawn fairly from a randomly
shuffled deck or decks. Replacement cards shall not be drawn until needed and
shall be drawn in accordance with the rules of the game, to allow for
multi-deck and depleting decks. (b) Cards removed from the deck shall not be returned to the deck except as
provided by the rules of the game depicted. (c) As cards are removed from the deck, such
cards shall be used immediately as directed by the rules of the game (i.e., the
cards are not to be discarded due to adaptive behavior by the gaming
device). (d) It is acceptable to
draw random numbers for replacement cards at the time of the first-hand random
number draw, so long as the replacement cards are used sequentially as
needed. Notes
